headline.main: Missouri Fires Hoops Coach Anderson Ahead of SEC Tourney
headline.print_headline: Missouri Fires Hoops Coach Anderson Ahead of SEC Tourney

lead_paragraph: Kim Anderson was never quite embraced by most Missouri fans, even after starring for the Tigers in the 1970s and serving two stints as an assistant to beloved coach Norm Stewart.
snippet: Kim Anderson was never quite embraced by most Missouri fans, even after starring for the Tigers in the 1970s and serving two stints as an assistant to beloved coach Norm Stewart....
